## QueryTypes class

Class to easily manage types filtering in a query.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class QueryTypes 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(value)](./doofinder.querytypes.add.md) |  | Add a value to the set of types used to filter. |
|  [clear()](./doofinder.querytypes.clear.md) |  | Clear all values used to filter by type. |
|  [dump()](./doofinder.querytypes.dump.md) |  | Dump the types set as an array of strings. |
|  [has(value)](./doofinder.querytypes.has.md) |  | Check whether the set of types selected contain the provided value. |
|  [remove(value)](./doofinder.querytypes.remove.md) |  | Remove a type from the set of types selected. |
|  [set(value)](./doofinder.querytypes.set.md) |  | Set the types to use to filter a query by type. |
